
### connections in TCP/IP  {.smaller}


* connection identified by <i>5-tuple</i> 

   * used by OS to lookup ‘‘where is the socket?’’

* []{.my-small}(protocol=TCP/UDP, local IP addr., local port, remote IP addr., remote port) 
<hr class="vspace" />
* local IP address, port number can be set with <code>bind()</code> function 

   * <i>typically</i> always done for servers, not done for clients
   * system will choose default if you don't

### non-connection sockets 


* TCP servers waiting for connections + <br> UDP sockets with no particular remote host
* Linux: OS keeps 5-tuple with ‘‘wildcard’’ remote address
